title: Metro Ticket System
summary: Microservices-based ticketing for HCMC: purchase, dynamic pricing, QR validation, dashboard.
highlights: Designed REST APIs for orders, payments, pricing, and user management
Microservices with API Gateway; event-driven flows via Kafka
QR-based ticket validation and admin dashboard

title: Koi Veterinary Service Center
summary: End-to-end system for Koi-fish healthcare: booking, diagnosis, treatment, schedule management.
highlights: Implemented appointment scheduling and doctors' scheduling
Customer and staff flows; online & in-person services

title: MyMatch Backend
summary: Backend services for student matching with OAuth and WebSocket updates.
